title: Final Action Executor
description: Event step that executes final moderation decisions and updates all stakeholders.

title: Decision Schema
description: Schema that accepts human review decisions with moderator information and Slack message details.

title: Slack Client Updates
description: Initializes Slack client to update original messages with final decision status.

title: Submission Lookup
description: Retrieves complete submission data from state for final action execution.

title: Action Execution
description: Executes the actual moderation decision by calling the content action handler.

title: Integration Points
description: Placeholder functions where you would integrate with your platform's content management system.

title: Publishing Logic
description: For approved content, this would publish the content to your platform.

title: Blocking Logic
description: For rejected content, this would block or remove the content from your platform.

title: Escalation Logic
description: For escalated content, this would move content to senior review queue.

title: Status Update
description: Updates the original Slack message to show final decision status and completion details.

title: Message Structure
description: Creates updated Slack message blocks showing final status with decision, reviewer, and completion time.

title: Escalation Workflow
description: For escalated decisions, sends new notification to senior review channel with context.

title: Senior Review Message
description: Creates comprehensive escalation message for senior moderators with original context and new action buttons.

title: Workflow Completion
description: Updates final state to mark the moderation workflow as completed with all decision details.

title: Status Display Helpers
description: Helper functions that generate appropriate emojis and text for different decision outcomes.

title: Error Handling
description: Handles execution failures gracefully and marks workflow as failed in state for debugging.

title: Completion Logging
description: Logs successful workflow completion and any execution errors for monitoring and debugging.
